Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Morgan
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine, due to street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Delayed near Linden
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are standing near Linden due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are standing near Linden due to track switching problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
